detail_desc: Pool shoes with a shimmering foot strap, moulded insoles and fluted soles.
Joggers in a soft fine-knit cashmere and organic cotton blend. Covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, patch front pockets and ribbed hems.
Long-sleeved top in patterned organic cotton jersey. Slightly longer at the back.

5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed denim with stretch. Regular waist, zip fly and gently tapered legs. The jeans are made from selvedge denim, a high-quality denim woven on traditional shuttle looms with a distinctive red/white selvedge that stops the fabric from unravelling.
Fitted top in stretch organic cotton jersey with a round neck and long sleeves.
Lined bikini top with adjustable shoulder straps and underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. No fasteners.
Metal and plastic earrings in various designs. Length from 2.5 cm to 6 cm.
Short, lace dress with a V-neck and inset hemstitched trims at the top. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a concealed zip in one side and a seam with a wide flounce at the hem. Lined.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with long sleeves. Press-studs down the front and along one leg, and ribbed hems.
Double-breasted jacket in a jacquard weave with notch lapels, and welt front pockets. Gently tapered waist, decorative buttons at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.

5-pocket, slim-fit, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a super-high waist, zip fly and button and straight legs. Embrace – denim with a smart stretch function that moulds to the body for a comfortable, flattering silhouette.
Wide, velvet-covered Alice band.
Long-sleeved tops in soft jersey with a round neck and long sleeves. The cotton content of the tops is organic.
Hair set with two hair clips and two hair elastics decorated with tulle bows. Length of hair clips 5 cm.
Long-sleeved jersey top with an open back that ties at the back of the hem.

Mesh trainers with imitation leather and imitation suede details, a padded edge and tongue, and lacing at the front. Recycled mesh linings and insoles and chunky EVA (ethylene-vinyl acetate) and rubber soles.

Shirt woven in an airy weave made from a cotton blend with a turn-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim fit ‒ a fitted style with shaping seams at the back.
Longer-style jumper in a soft, fine, fluffy knit with a V-neck, long sleeves and ribbing around the cuffs and hem.

Shirt in woven fabric with a lined drawstring hood in sweatshirt fabric. Press-studs down the front, flap chest pockets, long sleeves with press-studs at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Kaftan in an airy weave with a V-neck, buttons at the front and high slits in the sides.
Tights in a soft, fine knit with an elasticated waist.

One-shoulder top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a wide neckline and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The polyester content of the sweatshirt is partly recycled.
Loose-fitting vest top in an airy satin weave with a V-neck front and back.
Shorts in printed, lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and raw-edge hems.
Joggers in an airy viscose weave with an elasticated waist with a tasselled drawstring, side pockets and tapered legs with covered elastic at the hems.
Bras in microfibre and mesh with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Lightweight running shorts in fast-drying functional fabric layered over a pair of short running tights. Regular, elasticated waist with a concealed drawstring. Reflective details.
Short, straight-cut dress in a cotton weave with a resort collar, short sleeves and buttons down the front. Unlined.
Mittens in a soft knit with a front flap that can be fastened back with a button to reveal a pair of fingerless gloves.

Sleeveless dress in woven fabric with a V-neck and buttons at the back. Mesh bodice covered in floral appliqués, a seam at the waist and a double-layered skirt in glittery tulle. Underskirt with a mesh flounce at the hem for added width. Lined.
Jumpsuit in glittery-patterned mesh with a V-neck and low-cut back. Narrow shoulder straps, a concealed zip at the back and straight, wide legs. Jersey lining.
Straight-cut T-shirt in viscose jersey with a sheen, with a wide neckline and low dropped shoulders.
T-shirt in hard-washed cotton jersey with a text print on the front.

Calf-length dress in satin crêpe with a small collar with ties and an opening at the top. Seam at the waist and a flared, asymmetric skirt with draping and a pleated section at one side. Concealed zip in the side and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Long-sleeved tops in soft jersey made from an organic cotton blend.
Brogues in imitation patent leather with lacing at the front. Linings in satin made from recycled polyester, and insoles in imitation leather. Heel 4 cm.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Calf-length dress in a viscose crêpe weave with a sweetheart neckline, long puff sleeves with a button at the cuffs, a concealed zip at the back and a seam at the waist. Unlined.
Slip-on suede trainers with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Cardigan in a loose, hole-patterned knit with long dolman sleeves and rounded front edges. No buttons.

Long dress in an airy weave in a narrow cut at the top with short, narrow shoulder straps and an opening with a tie at the back of the neck. Narrow elasticated seam at the waist and a straight-cut, softly draping skirt. Lined.
Slides with an adjustable strap and buckle over the foot. Imitation leather linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Metal hair clip decorated with a large satin bow.
Lightweight running shorts in fast-drying functional fabric layered over a pair of short running tights. Regular, elasticated drawstring waist. The polyester content of the shorts is partly recycled.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Shell trousers in windproof, breathable functional fabric with taped seams and waterproof zips. Adjustable hook and loop tab at the sides, a zip fly with press-studs, and zipped side pockets. Shaped legs with seams at the knees for optimum mobility and reinforced hems with snow flaps and reinforced elastication. Unlined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
5-pocket, knee-length shorts in supersoft, stretch denim with elastication and a decorative drawstring at the waist, fly with a press-stud and slim legs.
Short top in stretch jersey with dropped shoulders, short sleeves and a decorative seam front and back.
Leggings in jersey with a soft brushed finish. Wide foldover ribbing at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Jumper in a soft cashmere knit with long raglan sleeves in a relaxed fit. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides.
Multi-strand necklace of plastic beads in various designs with a shell-shaped pendant and metal clasp. Adjustable length approx. 42-51.5 cm.
Sun hat in a cotton weave. Lined. Width of brim 6.5 cm.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves.
Trousers in a softly draping viscose weave. High waist with a small frill trim at the top, covered elastication and a drawstring. Diagonal side pockets and wide, straight legs.
Fitted vest top in ribbed cotton jersey with a round neck.
Long-sleeved sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a print motif on one sleeve and a gently rounded hem.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Trims and stripes down the sides in a contrasting colour.

Calf-length, jacquard-weave dress in softly draping viscose with a sheen. Double layer at the top, long, asymmetric ties that can be fastened front or back, a small opening at the top and 3/4-length trumpet sleeves. Unlined.
Double-layered jersey hat.

Knee-length, padded jacket in a quilted weave with a padded, stand-up collar and a detachable hood with press-studs at the front. Zip with a chin guard and a wind flap with press-studs down the front. Narrow elastication at the cuffs, diagonal welt front pockets and vents with press-studs at the sides. Lined.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and a print motif.
Lightly padded all-in-one pyjamas in soft cotton jersey with press-studs down the front that continue down one leg, and ribbing at the cuffs and hems. Polyester padding.
Straight-cut shirt in a pima cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem with slits in the sides.

Super push-up bra in microfibre and lace with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps with a lace detail at the back and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Jumper in a soft cable knit with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Off-the-shoulder jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with narrow shoulder straps, long sleeves and ribbing around the top, cuffs and hem.
Microfibre bra with a scalloped trim at the top and underwired padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Shorts in a stretch weave with an elasticated waist and a concealed button and hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets, back pockets with a concealed press-stud, and a zip fly.
Shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with real suede details. Narrow shoulder strap with carabiner hooks at both ends and a zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size 18x24 cm.

Sleeveless sports top in ribbed jersey with a deep neckline and racer back. Integral sports bra with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and an elasticated hem. The top is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Fabric cap with elastication at the back.

Super push-up bra in hole-patterned jersey with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps, a racer back and a hook-and-eye fastening.
Shimmering, patterned tankini. Top with narrow shoulder straps that join at the back and a wide flounce at the hem. Bottoms with a lined gusset. The polyester content of the lining is recycled.
Bodysuit in soft cotton jersey with a collar and chest pocket in woven fabric. Button placket, long sleeves and press-studs at the crotch.
Fully lined, 5-pocket, slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, and narrow hems.
Fitted vest top in ribbed jersey made from a cotton blend. Narrow cut at the top with a round neckline.
Long-sleeved top in airy linen jersey.
Short, V-neck dress in woven fabric with ties at the neckline, long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, and an elasticated seam at the waist.
